abstract: Derek Owusu Boateng (/ˈboʊtɛŋ/ BOH-teng) (born 2 May 1983) is a Ghanaian professional footballer who currently plays as a defensive midfielder for Fulham in the Premier League, and the Ghana national team.
comment: Derek Owusu Boateng (/ˈboʊtɛŋ/ BOH-teng) (born 2 May 1983) is a Ghanaian professional footballer who currently plays as a defensive midfielder for Fulham in the Premier League, and the Ghana national team.
